64. plugins.ccxdat —¶

64.1. Functions defined in module plugins.ccxdat¶

plugins.ccxdat.readDispl(fil, nnodes, nres)[source]¶

Read displacements from a Calculix .dat file

plugins.ccxdat.readStress(fil, nelems, ngp, nres)[source]¶

Read stresses from a Calculix .dat file

plugins.ccxdat.readResults(fn, DB, nnodes, nelems, ngp)[source]¶

Read Calculix results file for nnodes, nelems, ngp

Add results to the specified DB

plugins.ccxdat.createResultDB(model)[source]¶

Create a results database for the given FE model

plugins.ccxdat.addFeResult(DB, step, time, result)[source]¶

Add an FeResult for a time step to the result DB

This is currently 2D only

plugins.ccxdat.computeAveragedNodalStresses(M, data, gprule)[source]¶

Compute averaged nodal stresses from GP stresses in 2D quad8 mesh
